channel.title: How do I change what shops accept?
channel.description: I want one specific shop to accept a different currency. For instance I made an Assault Minigame. How I do I make the shop accept the points you gain? Please help.

item.title: How do I change what shops accept?
item.dc:creator: @moparwha moparwha
item.description:
@moparwha wrote:

Many tutorials on this.

Client.java make a new currency such as trading sticks

Wanneshop accept trading sticks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 12:17:40 pm[/size][hr]Here try mine. Search for your money something like

You don't have enough coins

Heres mine


            for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
                TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(
                        GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
                Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
                Slot2 = GetItemSlot(6529);
                if (Slot == -1 && MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19) {
                    sM("You don't have enough coins.");
                    break;
                }
                if (Slot2 == -1 && MyShopID == 8) {
                    sM("You don't have enough tokkul.");
                    break;
                }

Self explainatory?
